title: MUGCLUB EXCLUSIVE: YOU'RE Being Brainwashed! Crowder's Correspondent Explains | Louder with Crowder
description: Crowder has his Conspiracy Correspondent explain how subtle propaganda is brainwashing you. Then the team takes Q&A from MugClub members and talks about how to talk politics to people who are "apolitical," how Steven prepares for his impressions, and what the biggest challenges were when starting the show. #propaganda #mainstreammedia #mediabias
